lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Richard, of North White Plains, NY on February 26, 2016. Retired Chemical Engineer. Husband of Pearl. Father of Phyllis (Skip) Schoenhaar and Andrew (Maria) Kaplan. Brother of the late Milton. Grandfather of six and great-grandfather of three. Chapel services were held on February 28th at DeFriest-Grattan by Rabbi Howard Cohen. Interment Cutchogue Cemetery. 1/3
